iti86:0.4: Practicing In Line With the Teaching
iti86:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti86:2.1: “Regarding a mendicant practicing in line with the teaching, it is in line with the teaching to declare that
iti86:2.2: this is what it means to practice in line with the teaching. When speaking, they speak in line with the teaching, not against it. When thinking, they think in line with the teaching, not against it. And rejecting both, they meditate staying equanimous, mindful and aware.”
iti86:3.1: “Delighting in the teaching, enjoying the teaching,
iti86:3.3: a mendicant who recollects the teaching
iti86:3.4: doesn’t decline in the true teaching.
iti86:5.1: This too is a matter that was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
